hooks.command:
# Log user prompts for analysis
if [ -n "$CLAUDE_USER_PROMPT" ]; then
    mkdir -p .claude
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $CLAUDE_USER_PROMPT" >> .claude/prompt_log.txt
fi

# Add project context if available
if [ -f .claude/context.txt ]; then
    echo "[Context: $(cat .claude/context.txt)]"
fi

# Check for unsafe patterns (warning only)
if [ -n "$CLAUDE_USER_PROMPT" ]; then
    if echo "$CLAUDE_USER_PROMPT" | grep -qiE '(rm -rf /|sudo rm|format disk)'; then
        echo "Warning: Potentially unsafe request detected"
    fi
fi
